title: Morning glory
creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures, Pandro S. Berman and Lowell Sherman
brief_description: Katharine Hepburn collected her first Academy Award for her masterful performance in “Morning glory”. Cast to type as a garrulous New Englander who arrives in New York with one burning ambition - to be an actress - she delivered an effervescent performance. Based on the play by Zoe Akins.
